title: Resilient Population
description: Remove any 1 card in the infection discard pile from the game. You may play this in between the infect and intensify steps of an epidemic

title: One Quiet Night
description: Skip the next infect cities step

title: Forecast
description: View and rearrange the top 6 cards of the infection deck. Put them back on top

title: Airlift
description: Move any 1 pawn to any city.

title: Government Grant
description: Add 1 Research Station to any city
